publicwhip.spmotion: S1M-6.2 David McLetchie: As an amendment to the motion in the name of Mr Tom McCabe after "Thursday 1 July 1999," insert "Monday 5 July to Friday 9 July 1999", leave out "2 July 1999" and insert "12 July 1999" Supported by: Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Phil Gallie, Bill Aitken and Alex Fergusson.
